abstract: Fliers have popped up to warn the public: they describe a glasses-stomping incident and depict (quite approximately) the father of the child said to have done the damage. According to the fliers, neither apologized.
snippet: Fliers have popped up to warn the public: they describe a glasses-stomping incident and depict (quite approximately) the father of the child said to have done the damage. According to the fliers, neither apologized.

headline.main: Beware the Upper West Side Glasses-Cruncher
